import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk create verifications"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/verifications/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates multiple asset verification records in a single request. Use this for batch verification workflows such as classroom sweeps or inventory audits.

**Workflow Example**
1. Prepare a list of assets to verify.
2. Build an array of `UpdateAssetVerificationRequest` objects.
3. [POST /api/v1.0/assets/verifications/new](/docs/api/assets/bulk-create-asset-verifications).

**Minimal Required Fields**: array of verification requests, each with AssetId, AssetVerificationTypeId, VerifiedByUserId, LocationId, IsSuccessful.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating an asset verification.","properties":{"AssetVerificationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the verification to update. Omit when creating new."},"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset being verified."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp for the verification.","nullable":true},"VerifiedByUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User performing the verification."},"AssetVerificationTypeId":{"type":"string","description":"Verification mode identifier.","example":"web-manual"},"IsSuccessful":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the verification passed."},"Comments":{"type":"string","description":"Optional notes.","nullable":true},"Latitude":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"GPS latitude.","nullable":true},"Longitude":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"GPS longitude.","nullable":true},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Verified location."},"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional room.","nullable":true},"ExternalId":{"type":"string","description":"External tracking identifier.","nullable":true},"AssetAuditPolicyId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Associated audit policy.","nullable":true},"ActualQuantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Actual quantity observed.","nullable":true},"ExpectedQuantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Expected quantity.","nullable":true},"Flags":{"type":"integer","description":"Update entity flags (1=RunRules, 2=CheckStatus).","default":1}},"title":"UpdateAssetVerificationRequest"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Verifications created successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response after bulk creating asset verifications.","properties":{"ItemCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of verifications created."},"Items":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of created verification records.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Full asset verification record including location and audit policy details.","properties":{"AssetVerificationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the verification record."},"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset that was verified."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the verification was created.","nullable":true},"VerifiedByUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User that completed the verification."},"AssetVerificationTypeId":{"type":"string","description":"Verification mode identifier such as `web-manual`.","example":"web-manual"},"IsSuccessful":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the verification passed."},"Comments":{"type":"string","description":"Optional notes captured during verification.","nullable":true},"Latitude":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"GPS latitude captured during mobile verification.","nullable":true},"Longitude":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"GPS longitude captured during mobile verification.","nullable":true},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Location confirmed during verification."},"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional room within the location.","nullable":true},"ExternalId":{"type":"string","description":"External identifier supplied by integrated systems.","nullable":true},"AssetAuditPolicyId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Audit policy associated with this verification.","nullable":true},"ActualQuantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Actual quantity observed during inventory verification.","nullable":true},"ExpectedQuantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Expected quantity per inventory records.","nullable":true}},"title":"AssetVerification"}},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code."},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp of the request."}},"title":"AssetVerificationBulkCreateResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
